stories.title: “Work well under pressure” is a safety valve, not SOP
Simple and powerful video cloud transcoding – Vencode

stories.text:
Hello people, my name is Luca, the maker of Vencode, a complete cloud-based video transcoding solution for developers and companies which contains a multitude of quality features to transcode & manipulate video easily in the cloud without needing to fiddle around with encoders and all that funky stuff.

Simply integrate Vencode into your current tech stack using our RESTful API or SDK, and start transcoding jobs with a few lines of code.

Apply watermarks, resize, change video & audio containers and codecs, generate on-the-fly thumbnails, and receive progress and events in real-time.

This tool is a great solution to the current hard and complicated on-site video encoding solutions, and offers a much wider variety of features and flexibility being cloud-based. Oh, and did we mention, it's pay-as-you-go. ONLY pay for what you use, and the video output minutes.

If you have any queries or issues, please do not hesitate to message me and I'll be more than happy to help you.

https://vencode.io?ref=ycombinator
